headline: Don’t get me wrong, I love the new mobile UI

markdown.content: But I think @staff forgot to make the page that you can view the post comments mobile friendly

Still, what a great jobs you guys did! Im impress how you guys manage to listen to the community and make changes quickly! I especially like the fact that after login i immediately see new posts instead of having to scroll down to get past the now in hamburger menu section
# It would be nice if I don’t have to login again everyday, or maybe it’s just an iOS/Apple/Safari issue
